dcterms:description: A continuous action environment where an underpowered car must reach the goal at the top of a hill by gaining momentum from another hill. The action is defined over [-1, 1] and the reward function includes a penalty for using acceleration, creating a deceptive reward landscape.
dcterms:title: Continuous Mountain Car (CMC)

dcterms:creator: Marlos C. Machado
Marc G. Bellemare
Michael Bowling
dcterms:description: A larger benchmark environment where a 2D bipedal body made of articulated rigid links must move. The agent can observe joint positions and angles, linear positions, and velocities, and acts on the torques of its legs joints.
dcterms:title: Half-Cheetah (HC)

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms. It provides a variety of environments and benchmarks for testing RL algorithms.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym
